surveyTitle: 1996 Philip Morris U.S.A. Employee Communications Survey
instructions: Please take a few minutes to answer the following questions regarding Philip Morris UsA employee issues communications programs. After you have completed this survey, please return it in the enclosed envelope and mail it to us, postage-paid. It is not necessary for you to include your name or address on your completed survey. If, however, you have a specific issue or question that you would like us to respond to, please write your name and address in the space provided at the end of the survey. Your input will help us to better gauge the effectiveness of our existing communications programs, and will help us determine how we can do a better job of communicating with employees about important business and legislative issues.

questions.questionText: What Philip Morris USA issues publication(s) do you currently receive?
Of these publication(s) that you receive, which do you read regularly?
Please indicate the publication that is your primary source of business related news about the company.
